entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
